channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 02:20 Air alert in Ivano-Frankivsk region. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 02:20 Air alert in Ivano-Frankivsk region. Stay tuned for further reports. #ИваноФранкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukranian Air Monitoring System, and may indicate a potential or immiment air-based attack or other threat.
